name: Double Delights
description:
(XBox 360 controller recommended, but keyboard's fine too)

Double Delights is a game wherein two siblings had to move out of their country, but still wanted to make their dream, selling the best foods from their country, come true. 

Two players each use one half of a controller to control a character. One has to buy ingredients and create the foods, while the other serves to people (or in this case, animals) around town and in the shop.

Coordinate with your friend and turn your shop into the best-selling restaurant there is (while making sure you pay your rent)!

Controls (for keyboard):

Player 1: WASD for movement, IJKL as your directional keys, O as L1, U as L2

Player 2: Arrow keys for movement, 8456 (keypad) as your buttons, 9 (keypad) as R1, 7 (keypad) as R2

This game is created by VeggieStew in 24 hours for Games and Politics Game Jam 2017 with the theme "Migration and Nationalism".
